name: .MGA File Extension
summary: Learn about .MGA files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Document used by Manga Reader, a program used to read Manga comic books and print cartoons; stores a compressed archive of the document pages, including pagination data, text, and graphics; used for distributing manga electronically.

content: MGA files are .ZIP archives that have been renamed with the ".mga" extension. Therefore, you can decompress them with any ZIP decompression utility.
NOTE: Manga documents can be created using the Manga Creator program that is included with the Manga Reader installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
